name: Energizing
description: An Energizing Orb is used to Energize items and turn them into something new, such as Energized Steel or various crystals. Energizing requires at least one Energizing Orb within a 9x9 range of one or more Energizing Rods. $(p)An Energizing Orb and Energizing Rods will automatically link to each other when they are in range. You can use the $(l:materials/wrench)Wrench $(/l)in Link mode to view the link and manually link. $(p)Materials won't Energize if you place more than the required number of materials for a recipe.
